Package InternshipSystem

Class UserEntity

Object
UserEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
CareerCentreStaffEntity, CompanyRepEntity, StudentEntity
public class UserEntity extends Object
Represents a generic user in the system. This class serves as a base class for specific user types like students and staff.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String inputId, String inputPw)
      Logs in the user by verifying the provided ID and password.
      Parameters:
      inputId - The ID entered by the user.
      inputPw - The password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String oldPw, String newPw)
      Changes the user's password if the old password matches.
      Parameters:
      oldPw - The current password.
      newPw - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed successfully, false otherwise.
